reviews.review_text: Yesterday night we ordered butter chicken pizza and creamy cheese pizza, these pizzas were amazing! The chicken was tender, and that buttery sauce was something else. It had a bit of kick, but the creaminess balanced it perfectly. Unique and tasty   Creamy Cheese Pizza was a cheesy dream. Loads of cheese all over the place. Thanks Paragon Pizza for satisfying our pizza cravings tonight! If you re looking for some seriously good slices, give them a try. You won t be disappointed!

So, I just ordered my first pizza from Paragon Pizza today for lunch at my work place. It was awesome! I ordered a Butter Chicken Pizza, and added onion and tomato. There was a lovely little zing from the banana peppers in the background, but it was not overwhelming. It was too much food for me, so I offered some to my team coworkers, and their response was that it was very good, indeed. One of my coworkers had a second piece, and it was only a small pizza to begin with. Definitely a spectacular choice for pizza, so check it out!

Treated my family for pizza from Paragon the other day. I was drawn to promo deals via Door Dash and Best Eaters Combo ($39.99) seemed perfect for 9 of us. I ordered Butter Chicken Pizza, Everything Special, chicken wings and bread stick. I didn t know bread sticks were substitution for additional wings for the order. Food was pretty good. All my families were happy even nieces and nephew. Wings were very tasty too. One niece told me it was bit spicy, but everyone else liked it. The deal was unbeatable. Bread sticks were good too. I wish they had extra amount of wings in stock. Food was pretty memorable. I liked 2 free pops included in the combo.

I love their pizza! Perhaps one of the best pizzas I had in Vancouver (pizzas are usually loaded).. Absolutely love them.. They do have deals and sometimes, I was lucky to get pop or mango lassi free with my pickup.. Folks, I highly recommend them

I ordered house special pizza one hour before, and the young lady did so well it was really busy and she was working her self, but she still greeted amazingly. she was super fast and prepared the pizza in 12 minutes. I really appreciate I will definitely order next time from her or because their recipe is really good.
Best hospitality ever. I love the pizza. The pizza tastes so good. I want more. It is a must try for pizza lovers. The menu was well planned for veggies and meat lovers.

Their food never disappoints. No matter what the contents of the pizza, all pizzas taste delicious. We have tried their paneer and chicken pizzas and they are  mouthwatering and quite delightful. Also appreciate the fact they have stayed consistent in providing this taste over the years, always felt good about ordering from there. Go to for Indian style pizza!

Great taste and prices. I would recommend this to all those who are looking for some pizza options with Indian touch. Especially loved their creamy paneer pizza   The one in picture is a tandoori chicken pizza for my boyfriend which he said was equally good

Great family owned restaurant, reasonable prices, customer service, and delicious pizza! The owner gave my kids a free slice of pepperoni pizza while we waited and drew a picture on the box for my kids. Love the extra thought and will definitely be coming back here again!
I am not exaggerating or kidding when I say this is the best pizza I ve ever had
We got the cheese pizza and it was amazing!! Staff is super kind also :)

Revised review: omg the pizza here is so good! Do pick up to ensure your pizza is fresh and is the correct one. I ordered my pizza after dance class around 10 and it was ready in 10 minutes. I highly suggest ordering a pizza and picking it up vs buying a slice at the window. I bought the shahi paneer pizza and the flavours are amazing. If you like indian style pizza, this is a place to check out. Original review: Pizza was ok. Stumbled upon this place while waiting for the bus. Ill try ordering a whole pizza next time. It might be better. The slices are $2. It appeared that they were cooking many pizzas to prepare for the highschool lunch rush
Just loved the way they make it Indian style . Their creamy veggie paneer is beyona amazing. Thank you for the good pizza .
Butter chicken Pizza was yummy, with lots of toppings.
Surprisingly this is the tastiest pizza I ve had in Vancouver. A literal hidden gem. So tasty

It took all of about 2 minutes for our pizza to be para-GONE! They went absolutely above and beyond for my partner who has celiac disease by going and purchasing gluten free crust even though they were out at the time. The delivery took a little longer, but they just wanted to make sure we could safely eat our pizza. When it got here it was fresh, hot, and delicious! The pepperoni seemed to be sliced from the sausage of god, because it was far above average. Thanks Paragon! We ll be ordering again :)

A great spot for fresh pizza. Had the any slice for $2 special and it was fast and tasty. Good sauce levels and good cheese amounts. They do a really good job and you can t beat the price and convenience.
Delicious and great food I have had in my neighborhood . Thank you Vamshi and team for the understanding the customer needs and customizing the food products. Definitely revisit!!!

Good Indian style pizza and good price. The topping is nice. A little fast service would be really nice. Give yourself ample amount of time for your order. It takes a while as mostly only single person working in there.
Really good pizza, and very friendly staff
Great customer service, amazing pizza! I can tell they love what they do! I strongly recommend Paragon Pizza!
Very delicious pizza and affordable!

I visited to Vancouver last week and I heard from so many relatives about paragon pizza. They told me to try it once. We ordered butter chicken pizza from them. I went there for pick up of pizza and I was very impressed from customer service and moreover they give free dips with pizzas as well. Taste of pizza was so good and it was not that expensive too. For family parties it is highly recommendable.

This isnt your ordinary fast food pizza place like pizza hut, dominoes and many other pizza chain. This is a local pizza shop with very generous amount of toppings. The ingredients taste fresh and the weight of their slices had to be at least 2 times heavier than a chain pizza shop.
Fresh and delicious, my go to pizza store always, they never disappoint on any pizza, must try.
Best pizza in South Van. Excellent customer service. On time delivery and delicious pizza for all kinds of pizza lovers.

Used to be Round table pizza and is mostly the same.  I recommend their specialty pizzas as they are loaded up with toppings.  This is also a traditional thicker base and crust so if you are looking for thin crispy bases this might not be for you.

I placed an order around 10:55and the closing time was 11 but the girl who took my order she was very polite and sweet to took my order . She was very generous to served me at that time. She made my day and also the food was very delicious.

Have been ordering from Paragon since I moved back to Vancouver almost two years ago. The pizza is always hot and fresh, and their service is always genuine and friendly. Cant ask for much more than that.

Really like the pizza here and they have always been nice and friendly to me so I wonder about other peoples experince and what they did to turn it sour... I always pick up because Im not lazy and its not easy or pracrical running around delivering pizza. Funny pretty much all the reviews that are bad are delivered.
So yummy! Highly recommend. Delicious for me and my cat
Got the supreme. Great pizza and fairly quick. They sell slices also.
Butter chicken pizza and creamy veggie paneer pizza are very delicious.customer service is awesome.i always get delivery within time.i had great experience with them.

yummyyyyyyy.....creamy veggie paneer is really delicious ..I tried so many other locations for pizza but nobody can beat paragon pizza...I always recommend others to try atleast one time then definitely u will eat again and again...
Osm pizza really good crust flooded with toppings and so good flavors Loved it
Best taste pizzas. Everybody must try. Staff is very nice and respectful.
I loved their pizza one time. Super great pizza
Delicious ! Had it multiple times now and consistently tasty
Best pizza place in Vancouver, Shahi Paneer is the best pizza in town, simply divine, Paneer is pure cheese, not the fake stuff with chemicals we put in our bodies willingly.
I ordered pizza for the very first time it was very tasty.Delivery was to fast,Really impressed with the quality of the pizza nd well experienced Staff.Love the pizza place
Paragon pizza is best for me forever..really its best from all corners,its taste...yum ...delivery each &everything.another pizzas cant beat it .I highly recommend to everyone to try it.
Best and friendly place to order pizza. Yummy chicken pizzas. Such an amazing experience with PARAGON PIZZA. Wanna to eat everyday....
Pizza here is really good, prices are not bad as well.
So delicious. Good customer service. They also help me to charge my phone , during the power cut. Thanks.
wow very yummy. I really love the paragon supreme pizza& creamy veggie paneer.best best pizza in town.
Paragon pizza is the best pizza in Vancouver I think. Service , quality and price are great. I recommend Paragon pizza to everyone
I never had fish nd chips that i tasted here.. It is amazinggg... Nd specialy the combo deals.... Fantastic.
guys i must say a really loved the fried fish n chips and chicken pakora here and must try other pizzas too
I highly recommend the Chipotle chicken pizza from this place .!! These guys are very good in chicken specialty pizzas !! Its very place to order food for your party !!
Amazing Pizza. My favourite pizza from this place is Butter chicken. Best Pizza in Vancouver
Awesome taste and varieties of pizza and it will be delivered hot no matter what the weather is.
Yummy .delicious.top quality ingredients. I suggest to everyone try from this pizza store.
One of the best place for crispy and delicious pizza specially vegetarian one . I love this place
The 12.99 walk in pepperoni pizza special is the best pizza in south van :3
Razia is a stunning dynamo, and she will build a wonderful pizza for you.
Delicious margherita pizza and quick service. Buy 10 get the 11th free!
Great local spot. Never disappointed! And love their chipotle chicken pizza
Good Pizza and Good Proportions, would get some more again!
Very delicious pizza. Good price and quality
Best shahi paneer pizza ever. Must try.
Very fast service , I surprised. Pizza was very delicious.
Chain serving pizzas with a variety of toppings & sauces in a simple space.
Very clean store and food was awesome with good combination of price.
We have been customers here for years and have never had any complaints
well, what can i say, i love their pizza,
Amazing, love the pepperoni pizza!
We order from there every two weeks
Always delicious. Highly recommended.
non veg pizza very tasty
Great price and good pizza
Very good service and yummy pizza
Brother gave me a free slice!
Scrumptious choice
No words to explain the taste
Love the Pizza here.
Hmm tasty pizza
Great value for a pizza
Best pizza in Vancouver
Good
very tasty pizzas
Awesome taco pizza
Delicious Butter Chicken Pizza
excellent service
amazing site
good the pakora
